snippet.title: Elon Musk SPEAKS OUT On Being Amber Heard's Baby Father!!!
snippet.description:
Elon Musk Sheds Light On All Rumors On Being The Father Of Amber Heard's Newborn Baby!!

Amber Heard is a mother! The entertainer, 35, is commending the introduction of a child young lady — months after ex Johnny Depp lost his defamation case including her. A source disclosed to Page Six on Thursday that Heard is "past in adoration" with her girl, Oonagh Paige, whom she named after her late mother, Paige. Oonagh was brought into the world on April 8 with the assistance of a proxy after Heard was advised she could always be unable to convey her own child, companions uncovered. A source who realizes the star advised us: "Oonagh is totally beautiful, and Amber is shocked. . 

"The primary concern for Amber is that she's open about's first experience with the world," the source continued. "There are so many women who feel they can't examine their readiness and are worried and embarrassed; Amber necessitates them to feel maintained and comprehend that there are a huge number of approaches to have a child regardless of whether you have fruitfulness issues."

She added, "A piece of me needs to maintain that my private life is not anybody's concern. I additionally get that the idea of my work constrains me to assume responsibility for this. My girl was brought into the world on April 8, 2021. Her name is Oonagh Paige Heard. 

Heard is right now involved with cinematographer Bianca Butti, whom she has been dating since January 2020, yet she settled on the choice to have a child on her own some time prior and is "glad" to be Oonagh's sole lawful parent, we're told.

The extremist is next set to film "Aquaman 2," in which she plays Atlantean princess Mera opposite Jason Momoa in the lead spot. The introduction of Heard's child is especially piercing, companions say, as she lost her own mother in May 2020 at 63 years old, saying at the time that she was "shattered and crushed too much.", She called Paige "the most wonderful lady I had at any point known" in an Instagram post, adding: "It's difficult to envision and surprisingly more hard to say yet I feel really fortunate to have been her girl and been given the endowment of having the light she radiated on everybody, fall on me for almost 34 years."

Heard then expressed gratitude toward her loved ones for aiding her and her sister, Whitney, during the "inconceivably excruciating time."
The star's mother's passing came only weeks before she confronted Depp, 58, in London's High Court in a three-week preliminary in July 2020. She gave proof against the "Pirates of the Caribbean" star, who in the end lost his argument against The Sun paper over an article that named him a "tank top."

The appointed authority found that Depp had attacked Heard on twelve events and placed her in "dread for her life" multiple times. Talking after the case, Heard said: "Subsequent to acquiring a controlling request in 2016 and settling my separation, I simply needed to continue forward with my personal business. I didn't document this claim and, notwithstanding its importance, I would have avoided the chance to be here in court. "It has been extraordinarily difficult to remember the separation of my relationship, to have my intentions and my reality addressed, and the most horrible and close subtleties of my existence with Johnny partook in court and broadcast to the whole world. I remain by my declaration, and I currently place my confidence in British equity.

In the midst of the previous couple's antagonistic fight in court, Heard started dating Tesla CEO Elon Musk prior to continuing ahead with art dealer Vito Schnabel and It chief Andy Muschietti. The Machete Kills star was most recently connected to cinematographer Bianca Butti. "Bianca has been solid of her, and Amber feels like she can trust her and be pleasing around her, especially since they were friends at first," a source uncovered to Us Weekly of the pair in February 2020. "Amber is fine and more blissful than whenever in late memory. She really loves her." The insider added that the Aquaman star was "making an effort not to be serene" about her relationship, clarifying, "She feels open to kissing Bianca and holding her hands in broad daylight now. They began as companions, and it transformed into something else." oonagh amber heard oonagh paige
